subject: PEDIDO SSN4850
description_text: Buenos días. Me gustaría que me informarán del estado de este pedido SSN4850, ya que fue realizado el día 14/12/2025 y no tengo ninguna noticia de el. Muchas gracias

conversations.body_text: Hi Roberto Cruz Oteo,    We are currently following up on the SSN4850 pedals order to confirm whether it has been shipped. Due to the peak season, there has been a delay in order processing, and we sincerely apologize for this. We will process your order as soon as possible and keep you updated.
Hi Roberto Cruz Oteo,    We apologize for the delay. Your order has been shipped from our German warehouse, and we have updated your shipping notification.
